p: The biochemical analyses were focused on the detection of serum indices including GLU (glucose), TC (total cholesterol), TG (total triglyceride), HDL (high-density lipoprotein), LDL (low-density lipoprotein) and AST (aspartate aminotransferase). All of these indices were determined with an automatic biochemical analyzer [Abbott Aeroset Analyzer (Abbott Laboratories, USA)] in Zhongnan Hospital (Wuhan, China).
